abstract: Debate continues about Cleveland Cavaliers second-string point guard Matthew Dellavedova, whom many pundits and fans consider a dirty player; some cite repeated incidents in which Dellavedova has seemed to rile up opposing players and get them ejected; debate aside, Delladova has been key asset as Cavaliers pursue championship amid injury problems of Kyrie Irving.
lead_paragraph: The backup guard Matthew Dellavedova, whom some pundits and fans have labeled a dirty player, is also a big part of the Cavaliers’ success this postseason.

headline.main: Dellavedova Is a Firebrand and a Spark Plug for the Cavaliers
headline.print_headline: A Firebrand and a Spark Plug

snippet: The backup guard Matthew Dellavedova, whom some pundits and fans have labeled a dirty player, is also a big part of the Cavaliers’ success this postseason.
